page.title: 19Life in the Area.
page.content: All the people interviewed liked the {isolation, quietness}and{freedom}of the area. There are very few{amenities and the inhabitants have to do a lot of{travelling.}The nearest shops and petrol station are about two and a half miles away at{South Killingholme and{East Halton.}The{buses}stop only at Manby Road roundabout and{passenger {trains}have not run for over 20 years. {Letters}are delivered to the door but the{papers}are collected from Mr. Wilson's house on the main road. There are a few scattered houses surrounded by{industry:}L.O.R, the C.E.G.B, Texaco,Humber Sea and Land Services. Surprisingly there was little smell! The inhabitants make their own entertainment even though there is a pub nearby. However there are fears that a{nuclear dump}will threaten their lifestyles.
